amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Under Secretary for Management of the Department of Homeland Security by $10 million and increases funds for U.S. Customs and Border Protection Border Security Fencing, Infrastructure, and Technology by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Under Secretary for Management by $10 million and increase funds for U.S. Customs and Border Protection Border Secruity Fencing, Infrastructure, and Technology by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 302 - 113 (Roll no. 352).
